file.name: object-with-pattern.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  description: 'A sample object with a validation pattern (regex)'
  title: 'Sample: object with pattern'
  version: 1.3.5

components:
  schemas:

    ObjectWithPattern:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description: 'Some ID'
          example: 'xyz'
        name:
          type: string
          description: 'Some name'
          example: 'Prawn'
        phone_number:
          type: string
          description: 'Phone number'
          example: '+447123456789'
          pattern: '^[\d|\+|\(]+[\)|\d|\s|-]*[\d]$'
        locale:
          type: string
          description: 'BCP 47 locale string'
          example: 'en_GB'
          pattern: '^[a-z]{2}(?:-[A-Z][a-z]{3})?(?:-(?:[A-Z]{2}))?$'
